评论概述: Thin t-shirt material, but that's what I wanted
评论详情: I love this cute hoodie. It's lightweight, the colors are pretty, and it fits true to size.  The white stripe is slightly see-thru, but I just wear a light bra under it and it's fine. Soft and stretchy, I don't think it'll shrink, especially since I don't put it in the dryer. I hang dry and it keeps it very nice and didn't shrink at all.

I ordered an XXL and it is a perfect fit. It is warm and comfortable. The material that it is made of is quality and I love the color of it. I washed it and the color didn’t fade and the shirt did not lose its shape. Worth the price!

The quality is okay. The colors look how it does in the pictures. It's a soft and stretchy material. It's thin so not very warm unless you wear something under it. Would look nice with jeans, sweats or leggings. I air dry my tops so I don't know if it would shrink. Seems alittle pricey for the quality but I'm not disappointed. I might buy another color.
The shirt is comfortable, soft, lightweight and stylish. I love this shirt. I went up in size and glad I did, the large fits perfect.
Material is very thin and soft. Colors are nice. Would buy again.
Thin material, not as long as I would like.  However, I like it!  Great color and very comfortable.

评论概述: Fabric is thinner than expected & stitching isn't great
评论详情: I like the colors the fit and the pattern on this shirt. I bought it because I'd purchased on about a year ago but noticed the fabric is much thinner (more like a thinner T-shirt than a durable hoodie). I'll be keeping it but it will be something I will have to wear a sweater over rather than being a bit warmer for late fall or early spring weather. Also, you'll have to plan on ironing it to remove the shrink-wrap wrinkles. They didn't fall out in the washing machine or the drier. I'm interested to see how wash and wear it will be in the end. I would buy it if you find it at a good sale price, but wouldn't pay full price for it. Also, I got the same size as my other shirt but it doesn't have that long hoodie feel, and the sleeves are just long enough.
I love this shirt! It's light weight, loose fitting, super soft, and feels so good on!

Although the fabric on this is a lot more lightweight than I thought it would be, I have still enjoyed wearing it and adding it to my wardrobe. I just have to wear a tshirt underneath. The fabric is thin, but washes well and the seams are sewn well. The value is average.

I like the style of these shirts.  The material is a little thin but I just wear another shirt underneath for extra warmth.  There is slight smell that goes away after a few washes but over all I'm happy with it.  I like the way it looks on me.  Good length.

I like the price I love the material it wears well it’s made well and it washes well so I would definitely recommend it and I’m looking forward to buying more from this manufacturer in different styles and colors. I would definitely recommend it to my family and friends.
I purchased a medium size one and it fit great! I’m 5’4 and 124lbs and it fit just like how I wanted! Loose but not overly loose. I will buying another one for sure!

评论概述: Love everything except length NOT as advertised
评论详情: I really like this lightweight hoodie. It's perfect everywhere, except the length. It does NOT cover your rear like the model pictures show. Not sure if they've started making them shorter since they took the photos or what. I am ~200 lbs, 5'-6, 36C, and size large fits fairly fitted, not too snug, flattering, looks like the right size, but it is too short, hits just below the waist, the jeans zipper area is not covered, and definitely does not go down to the crotch or cover any part of the rear. If I sized up to XL, it'd be a bit roomier up top but according to the measurements shown would only be slightly longer and would still not hit where the photos show it hits on the models. If you look close at some of the real life photos, you can see it does ride higher on them too, but others not, so I'm wondering if they've started making these shorter than at first. Overall I like it, but really wish it were longer! It would be much more versatile, if longer and more coverage. Edit: I've checked the measurements and it is not as advertised. The length of the large is supposed to be 27.16 inches and mine is only 25. I smoothed and stretched it as well and that still only gets me a measurement of 25 inches, so it is over 2 inches shorter than the size chart says it will be. Maybe some people received accurately sized ones but it looks like they've changed them and are now making them shorter. I've noticed it is bothersome as I wear it, I'm constantly tugging at it trying to make it longer.
Nice quality, fits as expected. Would recommend

I bought the grey and raspberry one a couple years ago. It's help up nicely with no pilling or wear, so I bought the purple and grey one. Comfy and perfect for a warmish fall day. I'm 5'2" and 195 pounds, this fits a little loose on me, but that's how I want it.

Great for spring or cool summer evenings. Not a heavy material (more like a t shirt). Very comfortable and fits well. A little shorter that I had hoped, so it hits me in a weird place (mid hip), that isn't real flattering. Otherwise, it's a cute shirt.
Cute and very lightweight so not warm at all.

I love the colors on this and the fabric is very comfortable and looks like it will last. I had hoped the shape would be a little more flattering, since it is a straight line and very boxy, but it is definitely comfortable for a casual weekend, and is definitely roomy enough to layer over other things.

I liked the first one of these I bought so much that I bought a bunch of the colors, in long-sleeve and short-sleeve versions. they fit true to size. I would normally buy a 2XL because I like my clothes to not fit too snug, but after reading the size dimensions, I went with a regular XL. I'm glad I did. It fits perfectly! It's not too tight and not too lose. I am a huge fan of hooded t-shirts, which is why I decided to go with these in the 1st place. They are a light-weight t-shirt, not a sweatshirt, and exactly what I wanted!
Will be wearing this a lot during the winter. Cute and comfortable.
